ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, Internation 11 Development Association Recommendation of the 2ommittee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the prop )sed Credit and Grant (Pasture and Livestock Management Improvement Project) to Cyrgyz Republic The undersigned Commit ee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International )evelopment Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to Kyrgyz Republic (the Recipient) a credit in an amount equivalent to five million four hundred thousand Special Drawing Right: (SDR 5,400,000) and a grant in an amount equivalent to four million four hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 4,400,000). The purpose of said credit and grant is to improve cor imunity based pasture and livestock management in the Project Area. 1. The Committee has carefi Ily studied the merits of the proposal to provide such a credit and grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit and grant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of th,- opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such credit and grant ire to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articl es of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Re ipient and is of high developmental priority in light of the needs of the Recipient.
ï»¿-2- KYRGYZ REPUBLIC (Pasture and Livestock Management Improvement Project) 3. Accordingly, the Commi tee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association and hereby recommer ds said project for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for the Kyrgyz Republic C\AA Regional Vice President Europe and Central Asia uDa e aW i o,D Dated at Washington, D.C.
